entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
